about_the_game:
Secret Glory Hole is an interactive Visual Novel with explicit sexual content set in modern times but with a touch of supernatural fantasy that will allow you to reach different endings. If you survive or not -and how- will depend on your choices.

WARNINGS:

  • ADULT CONTENT.

  • Pyscological horror content.

  • Some blood is seen in some scenes.

GENRE:

  • Adventure/Date-Sim - Interactive Visual Novel - Psycological Horror

FEATURES:

  • 26k words (around 2 hours of gameplay).

  • 11 different endings (some of which you can even reach with different choices).

  • More than 1500 images (most of them expressions).

  • Animated CGs.

  • Option to rollback if you want to choose a different path.

  • Full English voice acting.

  • Steam Achievements

  • Text available in English, Spanish, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Portuguese-Brazil, Japanese, and French.

TAGS:

  • Male protagonist

  • Supernatural theme

  • Small tits

  • Big tits

  • Sex

  • Blowjob

  • Creampie

  • Throatpie

  • Mystery

  • Hardcore

  • Blood

  • Death

  • Horror

PLOT:

Your old childhood friend confesses you a secret: He knows about an abandoned public bathroom in the middle of a lush forest, where inside a toilet there is a hole. If you go there alone, at night, without a cell phone, after midnight, and you repeat the name “Elur” 7 times; A hungry female mouth will appear from there.

He guarantees you will live the best experience of your life. Will you be brave - or innocent - enough to find out about his glorious secret?

content_descriptors.notes:
Secret Glory Hole contains strong language, horror elements, humilliation (directed to the player), intense violence, death by sexual intercourse actions, and blood, as well as (obviously) nudity and explicit sexual material.

All characters are over the age of 18.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu / SteamOS
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6-10.14
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game is non-notarized. May not work with 10.15 Catalina

name: Secret Glory Hole

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10

short_description: -SHORT, NAUGHTY, DARK VISUAL NOVEL with several endings-A friend confesses to you that he knows a place where there is a hole, at the solitude of the night, from which a female hungry mouth appears. Will you be brave -or foolish- enough to find out about his glorious secret?
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, French, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
